m_szDocTitle: UK rail network attacked by hackers four times in a year | Tech | Lifestyle | The Independent
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Tech UK rail network attacked by hackers four times in a year The infiltrations appear to have been exploratory rather than disruptive but researchers say they highlight a real risk Wednesday 13 July 2016 17:07 BST   The UK rail network has been infiltrated in four major cyber attacks over the past year according to cyber security firm Darktrace. Darktrace, the private firm responsible for the cyber safety of a large part of the UK rail network, hasn’t released much information on the nature of the attacks, or who was behind them, but has said they seemed to be
